display.title: Yeehaw
description: §aHorses§r are some of the simplest forms of §dimproved transport§r.
A §aHorse§r must first be broken in by §3trying to ride it until it calms§r. Then saddle it with §7[§r§6Sneak+Right-Click§r§7]§r.
Horses can also equip §3Horse Armor§r (including dyed leather armor!) to §dimprove their survivability§r. Just try not to get one stuck in terrain!
§aPigs§r can also be §dridden using saddles§r, and a §3Carrot on a Stick§r can lead them.
§7[Dual Ride]§r Horses can also seat a §dpassenger§r.
